snippet.title: Cricket: Jae's Really Peculiar Game - Character Trailer | PS5 & PS4 Games
snippet.description:
Now coming to PS5 and PS4 on August 15th!

Go on an incredibly cute and heartfelt hand animated JRPG adventure to the moon and back with Jae and his friends! Combat incorporates timed hits to build meter, attack and defend, while unleashing awesome combos for rewards! Explore a world not unlike our own, full of laughs, tears, and Elemelons.

Jae is on his way to Yimmelia, a mystical land on the moon where wishes are granted. Along the way, he makes new friends to make the journey easier! Meet the cast in this trailer, and get ready for some amazing timed-hits based RPG action like no other, with humorous antics and countless unforgettable moments. 

#ps5 #ps5games #ps4games #ps4
